title: Braised Flank Steak in the Oven

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil.

Directions.2: Whisk water, steak sauce, and soup mix together in a small bowl. Pour a little into the bottom of the prepared pan. Add the steak, then the remaining sauce. Cover with foil.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until tender and hot and slightly pink in the center, 1 to 2 hours. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 140 degrees F (60 degrees C) for medium.
